Translations.Text: He said Indeed ja robit it when ja bol astray
Potom ja fled when ja feared ona moj Lord endowed mi s wisdom robit mi 1 posol
Ona chvastat sa lenze ona robit mna favor chvila zotrocit Dieta Izrael
Pharaoh said Co bol Lord universe
He said Lord z heavens zem everything them. Ona bol certain about this
He said do those around him ona hear this
He said Tvoj Lord Lord tvoj predok
He said Tvoj posol je sent do ona bol crazy
He said Lord z east zapad everything them ona chapat
He said ona accept any god mna ja throw ona zalar
He said Co ja show ona nieco profound
He said Potom produce it ona bol truthful
He potom threw jeho staff whereupon it became profound snake
he pocas jeho hand it bol biely do beholders
He said do elders him This bol zazitok kuzelnik
He chudoba berie ona tvoj zem jeho kuzlo. Co robit ona navrhovat
They said Respite him jeho brat send summoners kazdy town
Let them zvolat kazdy zazitok kuzelnik
Kuzelnik zozbierat appointed cas appointed dni
Ludia told Pojdem 1 all zozbierat dohromady tu
